name: Escape Robot Planet - Coregames
description:
This is our entry for the extra credits game jam, Theme is: 'Take Care'

-Defend your Downed Ship from robots during the night
-Search and collect resources during the day
-Use resources to take care of your ship and build more weapons for your crew!
-Build 5 Fuel cells to finally leave the planet and survive!

Made by Sepheal and MatsuPinta
